set(BOOST_ROOT $ENV{BOOST_ROOT})
set(BOOST_LIBRARYDIR "${BOOST_ROOT}/stage/lib")
set(Boost_NO_SYSTEM_PATHS ON)

find_package(
  Boost
  REQUIRED
  COMPONENTS
    program_options
)

if(Boost_FOUND)
  set_target_properties(
    Boost::boost
    Boost::program_options
    PROPERTIES
      IMPORTED_GLOBAL
      true
  )
endif()
